Posts.Content: Apr 2, 2015 04:17PM Skybunny wrote: I just finished my rads..16 days and no boosts...not needed. I am red and tender and did a lot of peeling. Like alligator skin...gross. but all,in all it was ok..... I see many people have 5 weeks of it ...that would be hard...
